title: Pro and anti-govt protesters clash in Chilaw
body_lines: A clash reportedly took place in Chilaw between a group of people who support the government and another group that was against the government.
Police and security forces were deployed to disperse the protesters to take the situation under control.

Police said tense situation culminated  when a group of pro-government activists led by State Minister Sanath Nishantha marching towards Puttalam, confronted a group of anti-government protesters from the UNP and another group and engaged in clashes.
